article_title: Victor Davis Hanson commentary: Obama now benefiting from oil policies he once ridiculed
article_text:

article_metadata.description: Gasoline prices nationally are on the verge of crashing down to below $2 a gallon. The price of oil may dip below $50 a barrel. Even with renewed demand from a global economic resurgence, energy prices continue to fall. The U.S. has suddenly become the world’s largest combined producer of oil and natural gas.
